system.description:
Your integration of military and natural skills has reached its pinnacle, and those around you benefit.

  • Certain types of followers become infused with the power of nature. When you take this feat, choose three of these benefits. Whenever your proficiency bonus increases, choose one more.

    • A Diviner follower, once they become seasoned, can also cast spells from the druid list.

    • An Apothecary follower may treat a number of allies equal to half your proficiency bonus instead of just one.

    • The first Sage follower you gain is proficient in Nature as well as their normal specialized skill of choice (which must be a skill other than nature).

    • If you have Footpad followers, they can use their first trait in natural surroundings. This represents finding rare or expensive things that occur naturally such as rare herbs, precious stones, gourmet mushrooms, and so on.

    • If you have Teamster followers, they may affect up to 6 creatures instead of up to 4.

  • If you have the@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.1tu6oun2uo9n9cer]{Lay of the Land} feature, its range extends to three miles and its exertion cost drops to 1.

  • Any Encampment, Menagerie, or Sacred Grove strongholds you build can be built at Average quality for the price of building them at Frugal quality.
